column3: Traffic; A Cambodian victim suffered a severe waist injury after his motorbike was hit by a Range Rover driven by an a white foreigner.------The accident happened at 1:30 pm on March 17
column4: 2019 at the head of the Boeung High School. Trabert Monivong Boulevard in Sangkat Tonle Bassac
column6: the foreigner agreed to pay for the treatment of the victim and repair the affected motorcycle
column7: resolving the matter at the scene.------Kohsantepheap
